description: Page consists of a collection of Elements. The order of Elements in the collection is significant, those elements will be rendered in the specified order (from bottom to top).
title: Page

___scene.description: Name of the scene, default is `*`

___fpt.description: Frame per second, the default is `60`

___speech.description: Specifies the text-to-speech to be played in sync with the animation

___duration.description: Duration of the animation in seconds, the default is `0.2` seconds

___repeat.description: Repeat rule of the animation, default is `false`

___vibrate.description: Specifies the vibration in sync with the animation, the default is `false`

___audio.description: Specifies the sound effect to be played in sync with the animation

___rewind.description: Rewind rule of the animation when the user leaves the page, defaul is `false`
